name: Mona Neal
title: Bud tender
coverLetter: Hello my name is Mona! I would love to be apart of your team! I'm a team player, I get along great with others, I'm a quick learner and I don't mind following directions. I have my own transportation and I currently live in the Los Angeles area. I have previous experience working in a medical shop. I have worked for 4 shops, 2 different owners. I'm open 24/7 for work!
experience: We'll multitasking is 1 of my strong points! Answering phones, promotion, sales, dealing with customers giving them nothing but absolute great customer service. Making copies, cleaning, stocking, etc
additionalInfo: I did graduate from Marinello Beauty School and Ruby Make up Academy.. I'm licensed and certified, I will use my skills to become a business owner!
